name: 2021: An Escape Odyssey
description:
2021: An Escape Odyssey is a 3D platformer where you run, jump, and dodge your way through three alien-robot infested sectors of your ship to reach the communications room and radio for help.

Created by: Ben Salva

Proposed Modifications:

1. Add multiple additional levels and tie them in to create a logical progression in your game.

2. Add a new obstacle (Lava floor)

3. Create a dialogue system

Guidance From: Declan McClintock and Professor Brian Winn

With Assets from MSU
